CSSColor-interpolation-method.summary: The <color-interpolation-method> CSS data type represents the color space used for interpolation between {{CSSXref("<color>")}} values. It can be used to override the default interpolation color space for color-related functional notations such as color_value/color-mix and gradient/linear-gradient.

remarks.para: When interpolating <color> values, the interpolation color space defaults to Oklab.
